title: Insurance Virtual Assistant
job_overview:
We are NOT looking for Part-Time, Temp Work or Gig Roles. We are NOT looking for a Virtual Assistant to just fill a job. This position is a stepping stone to becoming a Permanent Member of our Insurance Agency. 

As you review the description, we welcome any questions you may have about the position or our team. This is a Full-Time position (40 Hour Work Week) that employs from 8:30 AM EST to 5:30 PM EST. 

This posting is for an audition. We will be selecting 3-5 Candidates for a Panel Interview. After getting to know you and your work experience, we'll choose who to bring on to the team. 

Position Overview:

*Your role will be a Sales Support specialist to our Insurance Sales Team & Customer Service Team

The Qualities we are looking for are:

-Integrity
-Continuous Improvement
-100% Ownership
-Communication
-Teamwork

I’d like for you to have:

-Prior Experience in Data Entry, Admin & Customer Service
-Prior Experience In Insurance Industry (Strongly Preferred)
-Excellent English Skills For Writing & Communication
-Dual Screen Monitors & Reliable High-Speed Internet
-FAST Typing Skills & CRM Data Entry Skills

This is a Full-Time Position and Long-Term Position

Salary starts at 46,000 PHP per Month but negotiable based on Experience.

In the subject of your application, include the word "VA2025" at the end.

Thank you for your time!

-Sean
